recipe.name: Spaghetti Carbonara
recipe.description: A classic Italian pasta dish with bacon, eggs, and Parmesan cheese.

cooking_instructions.step: Cook spaghetti according to package instructions.
Fry bacon until crispy, then set aside.
In a bowl, whisk together eggs, Parmesan cheese, salt, and pepper.
Drain spaghetti and add to the egg mixture, tossing to coat.
Return spaghetti to the pan, add bacon, and cook until heated through.

recipe.name: Vegetable Stir-Fry
recipe.description: A quick and healthy stir-fry with mixed vegetables and tofu.

cooking_instructions.step: Heat oil in a wok or large skillet over medium-high heat.
Add tofu and cook until golden brown on all sides.
Add vegetables and stir-fry for 3-4 minutes until tender-crisp.
Season with soy sauce, ginger, and garlic, and toss to combine.
